epics.title: Dashboard Home and Customization
epics.description: Create a main dashboard view with customizable widgets and global filters.

stories.title: Implement main dashboard view
stories.description: Create a main dashboard view accessible at /analytics with customizable widgets.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard accessible at /analytics
Supports grid of customizable widgets
Includes add/remove widgets button

agent_context.goal: Provide users with a customizable dashboard for personalized data visualization.
self_check: Does the dashboard load in under 2 seconds with up to 20 widgets?

stories.title: Implement widget drag-and-drop functionality
stories.description: Enable rearranging of widgets via drag-and-drop on the dashboard.
acceptance_criteria: Widgets can be rearranged via drag-and-drop
Changes persist after page refresh

agent_context.goal: Allow users to organize their dashboard layout according to their preferences.
self_check: Is the drag-and-drop experience smooth and responsive?

stories.title: Implement global filters and auto-refresh toggle
stories.description: Add date range selector and auto-refresh toggle to the dashboard.
acceptance_criteria: Includes date range selector as a global filter
Includes auto-refresh toggle

agent_context.goal: Provide users with tools to filter data and keep it updated in real-time.
self_check: Does the date range filter apply to all widgets?
Is the auto-refresh toggle intuitive and functional?

epics.title: Widget Library and Customization
epics.description: Provide pre-built widgets and allow users to create custom widgets.

stories.title: Develop pre-built widgets
stories.description: Create a set of pre-built widgets for data visualization.
acceptance_criteria: Includes Key Metrics widget with 4 configurable big numbers
Includes Line Chart for time series data
Includes Bar Chart for category comparison
Includes Pie Chart for distribution breakdown
Includes Data Table with sortable and filterable rows
Includes Funnel for conversion visualization

agent_context.goal: Provide users with a variety of pre-built widgets for immediate data visualization.
self_check: Are all widgets functioning as expected?
Is the data visualization clear and accurate?

stories.title: Implement custom widget builder
stories.description: Allow users to create custom widgets with various configurations.
acceptance_criteria: Users can select data source (users, orders, events, etc.)
Users can choose visualization type
Users can configure dimensions and measures
Users can apply filters
Users can set refresh interval
Users can save widget with a custom name

agent_context.goal: Empower users to create personalized widgets tailored to their specific data needs.
self_check: Are all configuration options available and functional?
Is the custom widget saved and displayed correctly?

epics.title: Data Export and Sharing
epics.description: Enable data export and sharing capabilities for dashboards.

stories.title: Implement data export functionality
stories.description: Allow users to export widget data as PNG/PDF and underlying data as CSV/Excel.
acceptance_criteria: Users can export widget as PNG/PDF
Users can export underlying data as CSV/Excel

agent_context.goal: Provide users with the ability to export data for offline analysis and reporting.
self_check: Are all export formats functioning correctly?
Is the exported data accurate and complete?

stories.title: Develop dashboard sharing feature
stories.description: Allow users to share dashboards via a read-only link.
acceptance_criteria: Users can share dashboard via link (read-only)

agent_context.goal: Enable users to share insights with others without compromising data security.
self_check: Is the shared link secure and read-only?
Does the shared dashboard display correctly?

epics.title: Real-time Updates and Access Control
epics.description: Implement real-time updates and access control for the dashboard.

stories.title: Enable real-time data updates
stories.description: Ensure the dashboard reflects current data with real-time updates.
acceptance_criteria: WebSocket connection for live updates
Visual indicator when data refreshes
Configurable refresh intervals (1min, 5min, 15min, manual)

agent_context.goal: Keep the dashboard data up-to-date without requiring manual refreshes.
self_check: Is the WebSocket connection stable and reliable?
Are refresh intervals configurable and respected?

stories.title: Implement dashboard access control
stories.description: Implement access control for dashboard and data security.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard-level permissions (view, edit, admin)
Data-level row security based on user role
Audit log of dashboard access

agent_context.goal: Ensure that only authorized users can access and modify dashboard data.
self_check: Is the audit log comprehensive and secure?
